1: Nu c'ojol, we catch'aw puwi' ri awachil awib ruc', o cattaq'ui' puwi' jun ri man aweta'm taj jachinok,
2: xak a tuquiel ri' cacoj ri c'amibal pa ri a be: catximitaj c'u can cumal ri kas e a tzij.
3: Rech catquiritajic, nu c'ojol, at c'o chi c'u ne pa u k'ab jun chic, chabana' ri quinbij chawe: chamach'a' awib chacojo a chuk'ab che u tok'ixic ri awachil awib ruc',
4: chawesaj ri a waram, maya' jubik' uxlanem chawe;
5: chatanimajok, jacha' jun masat ri canimaj chuwäch ri q'uiakanel; chatanimajok, jacha' jun chicop ri c'o u xic' ri canimaj chuwäch ri c'amibal.
6: Sak'or, jät, jaca'yej ri sanic; chawila' ri cubano, chawetamaj c'ut ri tijonic:
7: pune' man c'o cätakowic mawi c'o jachin cäbin che ri rajawaxic u banic rumal,
8: pa ri k'alaj cutanij can ri cutijo, cuchap u c'olic aretak cätajin cäyac ri u wächinic ri ulew.
9: ¡Chak'ila' ri a waram sak'or! ¡Chak'ila' ri a k'oyolem!
10: Aretak cätajin catachiq'uic, catyuxc'at che waram, quebak'aluj c'ut ri quieb a k'ab rech cuya' caban jun utzalaj waram,
11: cäpe c'u na ri mebayil catuch'äc na jacha' jun wacatel ri e ruc'am ri u ch'ojibal.
12: Ri cuban etzelal xukuje' itzel winak xuwi banoj tak tzij cutzijoj amak'el.
13: Quebuyupuchij ri e u bak'wäch, quebuban etal cuc' ri rakan, quebuban etal cuc' ri u wi' tak u k'ab;
14: ri u chomanic nojinak che etzelal, amak'el are cuchomaj u banic ri lawaloyil, xukuje' cätzurun che qui banic tak ch'o'j.
15: Rumal ri' man c'o ta cunabej aretak cäpe ri c'axc'olil puwi'; pa jun u jakic xukuje' pa jun u tz'apixic bak'wächaj cäkaj chuxe' ri c'axc'ol man c'o ta u to'tajic.
16: E c'o wakib jastak, c'ä e wukub c'u ne ri quetzelax qui wäch rumal ri Ajawaxel:
17: ri bak'wächaj ri quequiban nimal, ri ak'aj ri banal tzij, ri k'abaj ri quebucämisaj winak ri man c'o ta qui mac,
18: ri chomanic ri quebuchomaj qui banic itzelalaj tak jastak, ri akanaj ri quexiq'uin ruc' rayinic che u banic ri etzelal,
19: ri subunelalaj k'alajisanel xukuje' banal tzij, xukuje' ri cuyac ch'o'j chquixo'l achalaxic.
20: Nu c'ojol, chebac'olo' amak'el pa jolom ri qui takomal xukuje' tak ri qui tijonic ri a tat a nan.
21: Chebac'ama' bic amak'el cho a c'u'x, chebaxequeba' chakul;
22: cäquic'am na a be aretak at benak pa binem, catquichajij na aretak cätajin catwaric, quetzijon na awuc' aretak catc'astajic.
23: Kastzij, ri takomal tak xukuje' tak ri tijonic e jun chäj ri e tzijtalic; ri pixbenic xukuje' ri yo'w tak no'j e are' be wa' re ri c'aslemal.
24: Catquichajij na rech man catuch'äc ta ri itzel ixok, rech man catquich'äc ta ri je'licalaj tak u tzij ri ixok ri man awech taj.
25: Maya' c'olbal chi ri u je'lical cunicowisaj bic ri a c'u'x che; ¡maya' awib chi catch'äctaj cumal tak ri e u ca'yebal!
26: Ri ixok re nim ch'utin cäbe chrij juba' caxlanwa, are' c'u ri ixok ri cäkaj pa mac ruc' jun winak chic are cuya' u wäch che ri achi ri c'o cäc'am che.
27: Ri cuya' k'ak' cho u c'u'x, cäc'at na ri ratz'iak.
28: Ri cäbin paquiwi' rachak k'ak', quec'at ri rakan.
29: Ri cuputzcuyij rib ruc' ri ixok ri man c'o ta cux che, man c'o ta u to'tajic.
30: Man c'o ta jun winak ri ma ta c'o jas cubij che jun eläk'om ri queläk' rumal u numic;
31: we c'u ne cäriktajic aretak cätajin cuban ri eläk', wukub mul cutoj na u q'uexel ri eläk'am, cuya' c'u ne na ronojel ri c'o ruc'.
32: ¡Sibalaj con ri achi ri cäbin ruc' jun ixok ri man c'o ta cux che! ¡Ri je cuban wa' xa u tuquiel cäretzelaj rib!
33: Cak'osix na xukuje' quepe tak il patan puwi', man c'o ta jun jasach casuw ta na ri q'uixbal ri resam.
34: Rumal rech chi ri achi ri achixomanel xak junam ruc' jun k'ak', man cäcuyun ta pa ri jok'otaj re ri yo'w q'uexel;
35: man cuc'amowaj ta apachique esbal oyowal, mawi coc'ow ri royowal pune' ta queya' q'ui sipanic che.
